overview: Final Battle 2011 was a professional wrestling pay-per-view event produced by Ring of Honor. It took place on December 23, 2011 at the Manhattan Center in New York City, New York.  Michael Elgin (w/ Truth Martini) vs TJ Perkins  Tommaso Ciampa vs Jimmy Rave  Jay Lethal (c) vs El Generico vs Mike Bennett (w/ Bob Evans & Maria) ROH World Television Championship  Kevin Steen vs Steve Corino in a No Disqualification Match (with Jimmy Jacobs as Special guest referee)  The Young Bucks vs Caprice Coleman & Cedric Alexander vs Future Shock vs The All-Night Express  vs The Bravado Brothers in a ROH World Tag Team Title #1 Contendership Tag Team Gauntlet Match  Roderick Strong (w/ Truth Martini) vs Chris Hero  The Briscoes vs Wrestling's Greatest Tag Team (c)  ROH World Tag Team Championship  Davey Richards  (c) vs Eddie Edwards ROH World Championship
title: ROH Final Battle 2011
